recipeList.directions:
1. Slice the beef and vegetables into small pieces and reserve separately. 
2. Heat a large wok or skillet over high heat and add about 2 tablespoons of canola oil. 
3. Add the beef to the pan and stir-fry for about 4 minutes until brown. 
4. Reduce the heat to medium-high and add the broccoli, onion, garlic and ginger and stir-fry for about 4 minutes. 
5. Increase the heat to high and add the soy sauce, rice wine vinegar and sesame oil. 
6. Stir-fry for another 2 minutes until the vegetables are just tender. 
7. Serve over hot cooked rice.
recipeList.ingredients: Beef (1/2 lb), Broccoli (2 heads), Soy sauce (2 tsp), Rice Wine vinegar (2 tbsp), Sesame oil (1 tsp), Garlic (2 cloves minced), Onion (1 large), Ginger (2 tsp minced)
